verbose_text: Furthermore, as we found that pretreatment with alpha2-AR antagonist significantly reversed the inhibitory effects of tizanidine on the SNI induced mechanical and thermal hyperalgesia, overproduction of proinflammatory cytokines, and activation of TLR4 / NF-kappaB signaling, we suggest that the inhibitory effect of tizanidine on SNI induced neuropathic pain is directly through activation of alpha2-AR in spinal cord.
evidence: tizanidine on the SNI-induced mechanical and thermal hyperalgesia, overproduction of proinflammatory cytokines, and activation of TLR4
